# transfer

Transfer a workspace

## Usage

```console
coder transfer [flags] [workspace] [target-user]
```

## Description

```console
  - Transfer a workspace to another user (if you have permission):

     $ coder transfer <workspace_name> <target-username>
```

## Options

### -O, --org

|             |                                  |
| ----------- | -------------------------------- |
| Type        | <code>string</code>              |
| Environment | <code>$CODER_ORGANIZATION</code> |

Select which organization (uuid or name) to use.
